title: How to Freeze (or Melt) Kiss

steps.headline: Fill the ice cube container with cold water up to an acceptable size of your and their mouth, and put this in the freezer.
Invite them to your house at around noon or so.
Do outdoor activities together when it's hot out, or at least warm enough to make you and him/her sweat for a couple of hours.
When you come back inside, sneakingly in some way ("I have to go to the bathroom," or anything like that) take the ice cube container out of the freezer, take that ice cube, and put it in your mouth.
For the first time you perform a Freeze kiss, tell them you have a surprise.
steps.description: If this is not your first time, just tell them that you want to freeze kiss again.

steps.headline: Start to closed mouth lip kiss them.
Slowly with your tongue, pass the ice so it enters their mouth.
steps.description: Pass it back and forth to each other holding the ice in your mouth for a few seconds at a time until the ice melts.

steps.headline: Continue with standard French kissing, or stop.

text: Fill the ice cube container with cold water up to an acceptable size of your and their mouth, and put this in the freezer. Do this during the morning. Invite them to your house at around noon or so.  Do outdoor activities together when it's hot out, or at least warm enough to make you and him/her sweat for a couple of hours.  When you come back inside, sneakingly in some way ("I have to go to the bathroom," or anything like that) take the ice cube container out of the freezer, take that ice cube, and put it in your mouth.  For the first time you perform a Freeze kiss, tell them you have a surprise. If this is not your first time, just tell them that you want to freeze kiss again. Start to closed mouth lip kiss them.  Slowly with your tongue, pass the ice so it enters their mouth. Pass it back and forth to each other holding the ice in your mouth for a few seconds at a time until the ice melts. Continue with standard French kissing, or stop.
sentences: Fill the ice cube container with cold water up to an acceptable size of your and their mouth, and put this in the freezer.
Invite them to your house at around noon or so.
Do outdoor activities together when it's hot out, or at least warm enough to make you and him/her sweat for a couple of hours.
When you come back inside, sneakingly in some way ("I have to go to the bathroom," or anything like that) take the ice cube container out of the freezer, take that ice cube, and put it in your mouth.
For the first time you perform a Freeze kiss, tell them you have a surprise.
If this is not your first time, just tell them that you want to freeze kiss again.
Start to closed mouth lip kiss them.
Slowly with your tongue, pass the ice so it enters their mouth.
Pass it back and forth to each other holding the ice in your mouth for a few seconds at a time until the ice melts.
Continue with standard French kissing, or stop.
